extendedInfo.description: iHeartRadio offers free music in an all-in-one, free internet radio service that lets you stream your favorite live radio stations. With the Android radio app, you can also create commercial-free Custom Stations featuring songs from the artist you select and similar music.NEW FEATURE: "Live Radio Profiles"Find recently played songs, on-air DJs, and get the latest news, photos, videos, and contests from your favorite live radio stations.THE BEST OF LIVE INTERNET RADIOListen to your favorite live radio stations from coast-to-coast including pop, country, hip-hop and R&B, rock, talk, news, sports, and more. Browse radio stations by music style and location, then hit the scan button to move from radio station to radio station within a format. Let our DJs know what songs are hot or not by giving them a thumbs up or thumbs down.CREATE YOUR OWN STATIONSSimply pick a song or artist to create your own commercial-free Custom Station featuring free music from that artist and similar ones. Choose from our catalog of over 15 million songs and 400,000 artists. Use iHeartRadio's exclusive Discovery Tuner to control how much variety you want in your music.ANYTIME, ANYWHERE, ALWAYS FREETake your favorite radio stations and Android music wherever you go. Log in to iHeartRadio for free through email or Facebook to make iHeartRadio uniquely yours. Create, save, and share your internet radio stations from wherever you access iHeartRadio.***Love iHeartRadio? Please give us a 5-star Google Play rating and review! Have a suggestion, question or concern? Please email us at help@iheartradio.com and we'll be happy to assist you.***

reviews.title: Splendid,great app
reviews.comment: Love listening to stations from all over.wish when listening to a favorite artist radio they give different songs of the same genre.overall good app
reviews.author: M blain

reviews.title: Outstanding App
reviews.comment: Great and easy to use and customize. The sound quality its much better than Pandora or Songza
reviews.author: Dan Benavidez

reviews.comment: I love being able to hear my morning show no matter where I am traveling to. Even WHILE traveling.\tLove, love, love!
reviews.author: Debbie Evanoff

reviews.comment: Totally awesome i can make the stations i want and i can listen to the radio\tOne of the best apps ever i love it . It is like pandora but better
reviews.author: Bethany Topper

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Its one of the best music apps ever! I love it. I like it better than Pandora.
reviews.author: Crysania Tucker

reviews.title: Almost great. Sammy GS3
reviews.comment: Thought it was fixed, the sign in every time thing. They fooled the crap out of me. It\'s not a freaking BANK APP!  I love it, mostly. What I don\'t get is why the Hell I have to sign in EVERY FREAKING TIME I start the app. These are MY devices, at least give me an option to stay signed in at the sign in screen.give me that and this app will be excellent.
reviews.author: Mauro Monreal

reviews.title: easy and convenient!
reviews.comment: This app runs great (and free) on WiFi. I love how it runs in the background of other apps. The variety and easy interface is wonderful! :)
reviews.author: Scott Bellowes

reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.comment: I love listening to 90s music and this is great for that!:) *no I wasn\'t born in the nineties! I love it anyways! 93.3*
reviews.author: Mikaela Williams

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Just simply wonderfull.  If U love music like i do.  I know U love the no commercials .
reviews.author: Sharletta Napier

reviews.title: Nice app, change in station could be easier but nice app in general!
reviews.comment: Cool app.

reviews.title: Love the Gospel Stations
reviews.comment: I love this app. Love it. Great when local radio stations aren\'t available in the office.

reviews.title: Better than Pandora
reviews.comment: Worked great on Galaxy S2, Note 2, Also perfect on S4. Best of all, has same and better options than Pandora.

reviews.title: Better than Pandora!
reviews.comment: I like I heart radio way better than pandora the music selection is wider and I love the option to listen to live radio. Great app never gives me any problems.

reviews.title: Excellent app.
reviews.comment: I love this app. Is better than Pandora,  good music perfect selection of all kind of music

reviews.title: Greatest radio station ever!!!!!
reviews.comment: Way better than Pandora. User friendly, better variety of music with few repeats. I wish I could rate this higher. Creator is the man...or woman. Big props.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is a great app for music. Love creating my own stations or listening to existing ones anywhere in the nation...just awesome

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Its the best I can listen to music and set an alarm awesome whoever mad eyour the best I luv it

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: This app is awesome, besides the fact that you have to have internet access to play these great stations. I would rate it 5 stars if you didn\'t need internet access. After all, its a great app.

reviews.title: I love this app!!
reviews.comment: I love iheart radio!! It\'s so convenient and full of new songs and hollywood news. I highly recommend this app. No regrets, just love!!:)

reviews.title: Awesome
